ing: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen green peas, thawed
des: "This easy, no-cook, unique pea salad is a delicious snack or side dish. It tastes great with sandwiches, salads, or other cold dishes. Be careful, it's addictive! Serve it once and requests for it will never end."
ins: In a large bowl, combine peas, Cheddar cheese, and  sour cream. Stir in chopped onion, curry powder and dill.
